abstract: Three executives of the British unit of Alstom, the French transport and power equipment conglomerate, have been questioned on suspicion of bribery, corruption, money laundering and false accounting, British officials said Wednesday.
snippet: Three executives of the British unit of Alstom, the French transport and power equipment conglomerate, have been questioned on suspicion of bribery, corruption, money laundering and false accounting, British officials said Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: Three executives of the British unit of Alstom, the French transport and power equipment conglomerate, have been questioned on suspicion of bribery, corruption, money laundering and false accounting, British officials said Wednesday.

headline.main: Three from Alstom Questioned in U.K. Bribery Inquiry
